Plot: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.
Title: Police Academy
Actors: Steve Guttenberg, Kim Cattrall, G.W. Bailey, Bubba Smith
Writer: Neal Israel (screenplay), Pat Proft (screenplay), Hugh Wilson (screenplay), Neal Israel (story), Pat Proft (story)
